TEXT: The applicants , Mr István Mázsa and Mr PERSON , are NORP nationals , who were born in DATE and DATE , respectively , and live in GPE and GPE , GPE . They are represented before the ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE , GPE . The respondent Government are represented by Mr PERSON , Deputy ORG - Secretary , ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

In DATE the applicants instituted proceedings before the ORG seeking damages from a company and its board members . On DATE the court allowed their action . On appeal , on DATE the ORG modified the first - instance judgment and reduced the amount of damages awarded . This judgment became final .

On DATE the defendants requested ORG to re - open the case as the final judgment had been based on false information . On DATE the court accepted their request and ordered the case to be re - opened .
On the ORG appeal , on DATE ORG annulled the first - instance order and remitted the case to ORG , holding that the defendants had failed to append the documents cited in their request .
Subsequently , ORG again ordered the re - opening of the case . The ORG appeal against this order was dismissed on DATE by ORG .
On DATE ORG annulled the final judgment of DATE and ordered the defendants to pay a reduced amount of damages to the applicants .
On the appeals of both parties , on DATE ORG modified parts of the first - instance judgment of CARDINAL DATE in so far as they concerned the applicants and upheld the final judgment of DATE .

A copy of the decision of DATE was received , with a view to its despatch , at ORG on DATE . It was posted by registered mail at ORG on DATE . On DATE , DATE it was received at ORG with a view to its delivery .

The Government have submitted the avis de réception attached to the letter containing the decision . They maintain that the handwritten date of service appearing on the avis de réception is DATE . A letter sent by ORG corroborated that the decision was served on the applicants’ lawyer on DATE .
The applicants have submitted a copy of the decision which was allegedly stamped on arrival at their lawyer ’s office on DATE , DATE .
The Government submit that no postal delivery takes place on DATE in GPE .
